suncertify.application
Class URLyBirdConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.application.URLyBirdConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configuration
public class URLyBirdConfiguration
extends Object
implements Configuration

Contains configuration information of the application. Configuration parameters are read from and saved into a java properties file.

Implemented as a singleton.

Author:
Oliver Hernandez
See Also:
Configuration
